results.title: The Cut of your job
results.brief_description: This film is intended to illustrate the importance of good and appropriate clothing for salesmen. The story is of an unsuccessful salesman who could not get promotion until he is taken in hand by a fellow traveller who persuades him to improve his appearance by wearing better chosen and more appropriate clothing. He is shown choosing a hat, suit and tie and the reason of his choice is explained. The result builds his self confidence and he is then successful in his work.

results.title: The Curtain pole
results.creator_credit: D.W. Griffith and American Mutoscope and Biograph Company
results.brief_description: The lengths a man has to go to just to replace a broken curtain pole and the chaos and mayhem he causes is something to be believed in this farcical slapstick comedy. Cast includes Mack Sennett, Harry Solter, Florence Lawrence, Linda Arvidson, Arthur V. Johnson. Silent film with English intertitles.

results.title: The Curse = Xala
results.creator_credit: Ousmane Sembene, Paulin Soumanou Vieyra, Societe Nationale Cinematographique and Film Domirev
results.brief_description: Things are not looking good for rich self-made businessman El Hadj Abdoukader Beye in his third marriage. For starters, there is a huge age difference between him and his wife, whose younger than El Hadj’s daughter. Secondly, he is stricken by a xala, a curse which renders him impotent, on his wedding night. It is through his attempts to cure his condition that writer-director Sembene Ousmane conveys a vivid and satirical image of life in post independence Senegal, and the gap between rich and poor and modernity and tradition. Included as part of Africa95, a nationwide season of the arts of Africa, screened throughout the United Kingdom in 1995. In Wolof and French with English subtitles.

constellations_other.name: Thomas Edison
constellations_other.description: Thomas Edison helped establish cinema as an art-form and mass entertainment. Many of his early films were short and showed everyday activities like riding a bicycle.

results.title: The Curious coati
results.brief_description: The coati (or coatimundi) is a small Central and South American animal related to the raccoon, and rather like an Australian opossum, but with a very much longer nose. In this film, two baby coatis, because of their inquisitiveness, get into all sorts of mischief in a scientists’ camp in Mexico; coatis are quite fearless, and make good pets.

results.title: The Curiosity that kills the cat
results.creator_credit: Cedric Maggs, G. Buckland-Smith and British Films
results.brief_description: Shows the extent to which animals, specially bred for the purpose or imported wild from overseas, are used in medical research, the pharmaceutical industry and the cosmetic industry. Suggests that some of the vast sums of money spent on animal experiments might be devoted to the development of alternative, more humane techniques.
